100_pushups.name: 100 Pushups
100_pushups.description: Sounds easy right? But it really isn't - I'm only accepting PERFECT pushups on this one. No arched back, your belly has to touch the ground on each one!

tasks.description: This has got to be 10 GOOD pushups. I will not accept anything less
Okay! More progress! If you can do 15, just a little more work and you've got it!

15_pullups.name: 15 Pullups
15_pullups.description:
A pullup is so essential for later missions! Don't cheat yourself out of this one - if you want to be able to do a lot later in life, you have to be able to pull your entire body up and out of the ground.
These have to be PERFECT, arms straight on the down - chin above the bar on the up!

splits_training.name: Train for the splits!
splits_training.description: Being flexible in your body is so helpful for EVERYTHING in life.

tasks.description: Two days in a row! You must do a full 5 minutes of stretching for 2 days in a row - this is an easy one...
This is a much harder one - you need to be consistent and stretch for 10 days in a row. Be careful and pace yourself - you don't want to stretch too far all at once.
This is a big one - again, please pace yourself. The goal is consistency.
